name: Coin Rush! (itch)
description:
Coin Rush is a Game where you have to collect all the coins in a level to progress, and was made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5

It is currently in version 1.0.

It will frequently be updated.

15 levels will be added every update that will take place every couple of days.

After around 150 levels, i will stop development.

Have a nice day!
